thread.title: Customer Kate Austin
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Customer Kate Austin

author: Customer Kate Austin
title: Customer Kate Austin
text:
Delivery was very straightforward, as expected by courier. The ordering online was easy to do and it helped choosing this company as there was a 10% discount if I subscribed to their newsletter which I was happy to do.
I would recommend this company based on the discount in comparison to other companies.
